name: Trash Simulator 3000
description:
Trash Simulator 3000

Take control of state of the art equipment to clean up this city.

In Trash Simulator 3000 you have the chance to save the environment, by emptying trash cans, and clean up other people's mess.

Drive the truck using WASD keys.  If the truck gets stuck it can be reset with R.

Drive alongside trash cans or back up to them to empty them.

When the truck is full you must return to base to drop off the load.
